roleset.name: (causing to be) dropping small drips

example.name: arg 2= non agentive dripper, argMs
example.text: Whether your costume involves black face and a noose , or whether it is a grilled sandwich where-1 I think the cheese is a little too drippy *-1 is irrelevant .

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Mr. Darcy's eyes looked drippy with clear liquid and his nose was drippy with yellowish mucous.

example.name: arg0 and somewhat dubious arg2
example.text: John was being drippy with his paintbrush while drunkenly painted the ceiling.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, drip-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls pour-9.5.
